sub_topic: Predicting the solubility of inorganic salts in water
message_1: What is the solubility of barium sulfate in water at a temperature of 25°C? Give the answer in grams of BaSO4 per 100 mL of water.
message_2: The solubility of barium sulfate (BaSO4) in water at 25°C is very low. According to the solubility table, it is approximately 0.0024 grams of BaSO4 per 100 mL of water.
